content.raw: The branch `entity_component_system_prototype` has working unit tests. It looks like this branch is based off `ecs_nogtest_broken_dontmerge` which removed the gtest folder. I don't think this needs to be fixed, the whole prototype will have to be integrated with gazebo's existing cmake files anyways.
content.html: The branch entity_component_system_prototype has working unit tests. It looks like this branch is based off ecs_nogtest_broken_dontmerge which removed the gtest folder.
